attributes.action: Give the people of Great Britain a referendum on the adoption of the new 'Treaty' signed by Tony Blair on 24th June 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair has signed this 'treaty' on behalf of the British People in direct defiance of popular opinion. We request and require the new Prime Minister popularly expected to be Gordon Brown to give the people a fair say and referendum on the adoption of this treaty as PROMISED by his own party over 4 YEARS ago!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
